Package com.oracle.tools.runtime.java

Interface Summary
JavaApplication<A> A JavaApplication is an Application for Java-based application processes that use system properties in addition to environment variables as provided by regular Applications.
JavaApplicationBuilder<A extends JavaApplication<A>,S extends JavaApplicationSchema<A,S>> A JavaApplicationBuilder is Java specific ApplicationBuilder.
JavaApplicationGroup<A extends JavaApplication<A>> An JavaApplicationGroup represents a collection of related JavaApplications at runtime.
JavaApplicationGroupBuilder<A extends JavaApplication<A>,S extends JavaApplicationSchema<A,S>,B extends JavaApplicationBuilder<A,S>,G extends JavaApplicationGroup<A>> An JavaApplicationGroupBuilder is a builder for ApplicationGroups.
JavaApplicationSchema<A extends JavaApplication<A>,S extends JavaApplicationSchema<A,S>> A JavaApplicationSchema is a Java specific ApplicationSchema.
 

Class Summary
AbstractJavaApplication<A extends JavaApplication<A>> A AbstractJavaApplication is a base implementation of a JavaApplication that has a Console (with standard output, standard error and standard input streams).
AbstractJavaApplicationBuilder<A extends JavaApplication<A>,S extends JavaApplicationSchema<A,S>> An AbstractJavaApplicationBuilder is the base implementation for JavaApplicationBuilders.
AbstractJavaApplicationSchema<A extends JavaApplication<A>,S extends JavaApplicationSchema<A,S>> An AbstractJavaApplicationSchema is a base implementation of a JavaApplicationSchema.
ExternalJavaApplicationBuilder<A extends JavaApplication<A>,S extends JavaApplicationSchema<A,S>> An ExternalJavaApplicationBuilder is a JavaApplicationBuilder that realizes JavaApplications as external, non-child operating system processes.
SimpleJavaApplication A SimpleJavaApplication is concrete implementation of a JavaApplication.
SimpleJavaApplicationSchema A SimpleJavaApplicationSchema is a JavaApplicationSchema for simple SimpleJavaApplications.
VirtualizedJavaApplicationBuilder<A extends JavaApplication<A>,S extends JavaApplicationSchema<A,S>> An VirtualizedJavaApplicationBuilder is a JavaApplicationBuilder that realizes JavaApplications as pseudo virtual processes, in that they are run in the Java Virtual Machine hosting said builder.
